features: For A Tidy & Well Organized Baby Closet: The baby closet dividers make it super easy to stay organized and on top of all the baby clothes! Thanks to the cute baby closet organizer set incl. 7 dividers for newborn, 0-3, 3-6 months etc. & you are all set for your little one to grow size by size

Double-Sided - Easily Legible From Any Side: Each 7x3.5” baby closet organizer for your nursery is double-sided helping you to find the clothing you want quickly no matter from which side you open the closet. What a functional & well structured organizer system for baby clothes

Made Of Premium Wood: Crafted with smooth, chip-resistant and durable wood, the baby closet dividers by KIBAGA are your top-notch nursery closet organizer keeping clothes organized in a premium manner - without snagging your bundle of joys’ clothing

Cute Design - Perfect For Girls & Boys Alike: The classy wooden material is matched with the lovely design, including a gorgeous modern font! In addition to being a great organizer, the dividers are also a pretty nursery decor for your baby girl or boy

Fabulous Gift For All Parents-To-Be: Expectant parents will love this thoughtful and very useful baby shower gift! Support them in staying organized and therefore creating more time for the important things like cuddling with their new family member
body.description: KIBAGA Baby Closet Dividers: Makes Organizing Baby Clothes A Breeze! Did your family & friends go crazy buying all that cute baby clothes for your soon-to-be new family member and the pile of baby clothes is getting a bit overwhelming? Get back your peace of mind, so you can fully enjoy the arrival of your bundle of joy! The baby closet dividers by KIBAGA are here for you to stay on top of the game when it comes to organizing all the baby clothes in a functional manner. The set of 7 adorable dividers (7x3.5” each) makes it so much easier to quickly categorize the baby clothes according to their age by month - starting from newborn, 0-3 months, 3-6 months, etc. up to 24 months. Each divider is double-sided so you can easily access the correct size from each angle or side of the closet. Organization at its finest - and you are all prepared for your child to grow from month to month! Made of premium wood, the baby closet dividers are durable, chip-resistant and smooth, so baby clothing does not get snagged. As a gorgeous addition to the top-notch wood look, the dividers are beautifully designed with a modern font and a stylish. The gender-neutral design makes the closet organizer a wonderful gift for all parents-to-be. Definitely a practical baby shower gift that all expectant parents can use! With the cute baby clothing dividers by KIBAGA you can stay organized and fully focus on enjoying quality time with your little one! ***All designs are protected by U.S. Reg. Copyright 2023***

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Beautiful Wooden Baby Closet Dividers and I must say, they are a game-changer when it comes to organizing my little one's clothes. These double-sided organizers are not only functional but also add a touch of adorable nursery decor to the room.First and foremost, the quality of these closet dividers is excellent. They are made from sturdy wood, ensuring that they will last for a long time. The dividers are also beautifully crafted with cute designs on both sides, making them a lovely addition to any nursery. The attention to detail is evident, and they truly elevate the overall look of the closet.The dividers come in a set that includes sizes ranging from newborn to 24 months. This is extremely helpful in keeping the little one's clothes organized and easily accessible. It eliminates the need to dig through a pile of clothes to find the right size, especially during those chaotic moments when you need to dress your baby quickly.What I appreciate most about these dividers is how easy they are to use. They simply slide onto the closet rod and stay in place without any hassle. The dividers have clear and bold labels on both sides, indicating the different sizes. This makes it effortless to sort and categorize your baby's clothes, ensuring that everything is in its proper place.Additionally, the dividers are versatile and can be used for both baby girls and boys. The gender-neutral designs make them suitable for any nursery theme or color scheme. This is a great feature, especially if you have more than one child or plan on using them for future babies.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with the Beautiful Wooden Baby Closet Dividers. They not only serve their purpose of keeping my little one's clothes organized but also add a charming touch to the nursery decor. The quality and durability are top-notch, and the ease of use is a major plus. If you're looking for a practical and adorable way to organize your baby's clothes, I highly recommend these closet dividers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute but small
reviews.reviewText: Very cute hangers and will look nice in the closet. They are thin sheets but sturdy and a good value. Smaller in size that I anticipated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite registry gift!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for myself, and I’m so glad I did. In my mind, the idea of spending money on tags was silly.. however I’m glad I just went ahead and bought them. They’re very sturdy and durable. And so cute! The size is perfect because it was bulky and sticking out to look tacky in the closet, but it stuck out just enough to had separation in clothes sizes. The closet is lots more organized now. And they don’t slip off the rod.I will for sure buy these for every baby shower gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great quality, super cute, and do the job perfectly to organize the closet. They are also perfect size not too big and not too small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am using these for my babies closet and they’re so helpful. They’re super simple, but they’re cute and they get the job done! They’re smaller than I thought but that’s okay, I still love them! Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am in my nesting phase of my pregnancy and have the urge to organize everything. I got these cute closet dividers for my baby girl’s nursery and they are adorable. They are lightweight and good quality. They did not feel like they would break. They make organizing my baby’s clothes a little easier, they’re stylish, and priced reasonably.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, high quality, and less than half the price of the ones on Etsy
reviews.reviewText: Definitely buy these if you are looking for some dividers that are high quality and reasonably priced. I saw these exact same ones on Etsy going for $35+! Save your money and get these, they are identical and work perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are so cute and great in the closet. They are sturdy and easy to read the sections after you hang up clothes! Would buy again!
